info.title: Kidslike V2 API docs
info.description: API documentation for GoIT project 'Kidslike V2'. Backend github repository: https://github.com/DanTsvirkun/kidslike_v2-backend

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body) / No token provided

404.description: Child not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

get.summary: Get all children habits for current user

400.description: No token provided

404.description: Invalid user / Invalid session

parameters.name: Child's id
parameters.description: Id of the child you want to update (_id field in child's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body or id) / No token provided

404.description: Child not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

parameters.name: Request body
parameters.description: Request body. At least one field is required.

parameters.name: Habit's id
parameters.description: Habit's id (_id field in habit's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body or id) / No token provided

404.description: Child not found / Habit not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

parameters.name: Habit's id
parameters.description: Habit's id (_id field in habit's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid id) / No token provided

404.description: Child not found / Habit not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

patch.summary: Set habit's current day status to confirmed

parameters.name: Habit's id
parameters.description: Habit's id (_id field in habit's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid id) / No token provided / Today's day doesn't exist on provided habit

403.description: This day has already been confirmed

404.description: Child not found / Habit not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

patch.summary: Set habit's current day to canceled (child did not fulfill his task)

parameters.name: Habit's id
parameters.description: Habit's id (_id field in habit's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid id) / No token provided / Today's day doesn't exist on provided habit

403.description: This day has already been canceled

404.description: Child not found / Habit not found / Invalid user / Invalid session
